CustomField.formula:
IF( Costline_Sell_Price__c < Booked_Sale_Price__c ,
Booked_Sale_Price__c * IF ( ISNULL($Setup.System_Configure__c.Above_Costline__c), 2, $Setup.System_Configure__c.Above_Costline__c ) /100,
Booked_Sale_Price__c * IF ( ISNULL($Setup.System_Configure__c.Under_Costline__c), 1, $Setup.System_Configure__c.Under_Costline__c ) /100 ) + Commission_Stip__c
CustomField.label: Commission
